mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dict_t_modelcode ( APPID, TABLEID, NAME, DBTABLENAME, ORDERID, ISREPBASE, ISLVL, SQLCON, DYNAMICWHERE, ISORGID, FASPCSID, ISFASP ) VALUES ( #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbtablename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isrepbase,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{islvl,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sqlcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dynamicwhere,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isorgid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{faspcsid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isfasp,jdbcType=CHAR} )

INSERT INTO P#dict_t_modelcode (year, province, appid, tableid, name, dbtablename, orderid, isrepbase, islvl, sqlcon, dynamicwhere, isorgid, dbversion, status, insertversion) select year, ${province}, appid, tableid, name, dbtablename, orderid, isrepbase, islvl, sqlcon, dynamicwhere, isorgid, dbversion, status, insertversion from P#dict_t_modelcode t where Year=Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') and t.status='1' and t.PROVINCE=Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('DIVID') and t.tableid not in(select m.tableid from P#dict_t_modelcode m where m.year=Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') and m.status='1' and m.province=#{province} )
mapper.select: GRANT SELECT ON ${table_name} TO ${user_name} WITH GRANT OPTION
SELECT T.TABLEID ID,T.NAME FROM DICT_T_MODELCODE T WHERE T.APPID=#{appID}
